solution_line_template: At the start, there were {initial_racers} racers, who were joined by {racers_joined} more racers, thus {initial_racers}+{racers_joined} =<<{initial_racers}+{racers_joined}={racers_after_joining}>>{racers_after_joining} racers
After 30 more minutes, the number of racers doubled, totaling {racers_after_joining}*{doubling_factor} = {racers_after_doubling} racers.
If the number of racers who finished is {racers_finished}, the {racers_after_doubling}-{racers_finished} = {dropped_racers} racers dropped before finishing.
